channel.title: [delta] prices [delta]
channel.description:
How do I change the prices of items in shops?
I added a 2B and 1B Ticket in the shops and they sell for 2b but when you try to sell back its 800m and 400m. I want them to sell back for 2b and 1b also

item.title: [delta] prices [delta]
item.dc:creator: @Oh-Noes Oh-Noes
item.description:
@Oh-Noes wrote:

You could change the actual sell method to force it to sell for a specified amount instead of using the values read from item.cfg.

For example:

public boolean sellItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) { ... if(itemID != ticket) TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 1, fromSlot)); else TotPrice2 = 2000000000 ...

Read full topic

item.description:

I might just make it another command in the quest tab…
